section.name: Action Items
section.p: The following action items need to be completed prior to a Version 1.0 release of this component:

ul.li: Compress - Move the compress sub-package out of IO - READY
IOUtils: Remove the toByteArray() variants with the bufferSize parameter. Reasoning can be found at http://www.mail-archive.com/commons-dev@jakarta.apache.org/msg19703.html
FileUtils: This class is a big mess ATM. We need to clean it up.
Creation of FilenameUtils: This class will take over the methods with String filename parameters. FileUtils is only for methods with java.io.File parameters.
Need to see if FilterWriter/Reader are predictable (see also ProxyInput/OutputStream)
A CsvReader/Writer set of classes in a csv sub-package
FilePoller for telling when a file changes. Look in Tomcat, or GenJava[bayard]
JoinReader/ConcatReader. One in GenJava, one submitted to Bayard
FormattedWriter, when it writes out values it uses Format objects to output them.
FixedWidthReader. Reads in files with a known width, ie) mainframe like.
Finder system. Generic code to find things in things. So FileFinder, ClassFinder, ZipFinder. Probably too big for IO

Add an additional ByteArrayOutputStream variant that saves content in memory just as the original but starts to write to a temp file when a given number of bytes is surpassed. This is to reduce the memory usage for big "things".
Integration. Seek and integrate various i/o related classes.
Install / Use Documentation. Create simple installation and User's Guide documentation for this component.
